questions.question: What makes your modernizations different from the original texts?
questions.answer: Our modernizations preserve the original story, themes, and character development while updating the language to be more accessible to contemporary readers. We maintain the author's voice and intent while making the text flow naturally for today's audience.

questions.question: Do you change the plot or characters in your modernizations?
questions.answer: No, we never alter the core plot, character motivations, or major story elements. Our goal is to make the language more accessible while staying true to the original narrative and character development.

questions.question: How do you choose which books to modernize?
questions.answer: We select works that have stood the test of time but may be challenging for modern readers due to dated language or cultural references. We focus on stories with universal themes that resonate across generations.

questions.question: Are your modernizations available in different formats?
questions.answer: Currently, our modernizations are available in digital format through our website. We're working on expanding to include print editions and audiobooks in the future.

questions.question: Can I read the original text alongside the modernization?
questions.answer: Yes! We provide links to public domain versions of the original texts so readers can compare and appreciate both versions. This allows you to see how we've updated the language while preserving the story's essence.

questions.question: Do you offer reading guides or discussion questions?
questions.answer: We're developing reading guides and discussion questions for each modernization to help readers engage more deeply with the text. These will be available soon on each book's page.

questions.question: How do I report an error or suggest an improvement?
questions.answer: We welcome feedback! You can contact us through our contact form or email us directly. We review all suggestions and corrections to continuously improve our modernizations.

questions.question: Are your modernizations suitable for educational use?
questions.answer: Absolutely! Our modernizations are perfect for classrooms, book clubs, and educational settings. They help bridge the gap between classic literature and contemporary readers.

questions.question: Do you have plans for more books in the future?
questions.answer: Yes! We're constantly working on new modernizations. We regularly add new titles to our collection, focusing on works that would benefit most from updated language while maintaining their literary value.
